overview: A compilation of 14 Tom and Jerry original classic shorts:  Yankee Doodle Mouse;  Salt Water Tabby;  Tee For Two;  Mice Follies;  The Cat Concerto;  Solid Serenade;  Zoot Cat;  Johann Mouse;  Dr. Jeckyl and Mr. Mouse;  Mouse in Manhattan;  Jerry and the Lion;  The Little Orphan;  Kitty Foiled;  Jerry's Diary
title: Tom and Jerry's Greatest Chases
